title: EP 409 Keith Neumeyer Unplugged
itunes:title: Keith Neumeyer Unplugged
description:
Keith Neumeyer, legendary resource
expert and founder of First Mining Finance, talks about the recent
300% rise in his stock over the past three months. He also talks
about acquiring more assets and building First Mining Finance into
a 20 ounce gold mineral bank.  
Keith then breaks down First
Majestic Silver and is recent 350% rise in the stock since January.
 He also talks about the recent rise in silver prices and why
the metal could double over the next 24 months.
